snippet.title: Indie shoot em up game   SHOOTING STAR 2nd LEVEL
snippet.description:
Hi there!
This is level 2 of my indie shoot'em up Shooting Star (test title). The game is in HD and 60 fps, I just compressed the video to get better upload speed.

Information:

- Platform:
Steam and a probable consoles port.
- Graphics:
All by me, since my main specialty is 2D art.
- Programming:
Mostly me, with some help from better programmers, who'll be credited for sure.
- Sound effects:
Me using free sound effect softwares.
- Voices:
By a friend, Sonya K., edited by me, she'll be credited as well and paid if I decide to sell the game.
- Music:
Blazing Star by SNK, one of my favorite shoot'em ups. they aren't final though.
- Softwares used:
Game Maker Studio
Paint Tools Sai
Free Audio Editor
Bfxr
